nodes.text: The 3L41UH7 serum was a mutagenic fluid created by Zeta Magnus, an Accelerated Transgenic Heuristic Abhorer. During the Clone Wars, Magnus provided General Grievous, the cyborg Supreme Commander of the Droid Army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, with samples of that serum.

SkyeWalkers author Abel G. Peña intended this serum to be the one seen in Star Wars: Clone Wars used to mutate the natives of Nelvaan. Influenced by the many homages in Star Wars materials to George Lucas's earlier film, THX-1138, Peña named the substance after LUH-3417, the love interest of the title character of the film.
